amendment.description: Amendment places a cap of 2,300 on the number of executive branch political appointees that can be named.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that the President, acting through OMB, take the steps necessary to ensure that there are no more than 2,300 political appointees in the Executive Branch after September 30, 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutknecht amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 267 - 150 (Roll no. 318).
